extendedInfo.description: Music and tunes which can make your child or baby fall asleep. ****PERFECT Score from uTest AppGrader! http://appgrader.utest.com/developer/dashboard?run_id=2537082Move to SD option!****Your baby cries a lot or delayed sleep? You can put a nice sound to calm your baby and allow him to sleep like an angel. In the app, beautiful songs and tunes that will really calm your baby. Lullabies are sung by mothers around the world for their children fall asleep.In the Music App:â Great quality of the sound â Absolutely Relaxing!â The best relaxing sound!â Truly miraculous relaxation that will keep you feeling rejuvenated once more.A lullaby is a soothing song, usually sung to young children before they go to sleep, with the intention of speeding that process. As a result they are often simple and repetitive. Lullabies can be found in every culture and since the ancient period.Play beautiful music melodies for your baby.Beautiful melodies of classic scores and children's songs have been selected and added.This application is equipped with useful functions only. All persons are invited to help promote this application for (friends, colleagues, mother, father, grandmother, grandfather, brother, sister).Keywords: babies, children, sleep, baby sleep, music, sounds, baby.Enjoy!

reviews.title: SD card
reviews.comment: Still cannot move to SD card.! Please fix. Otherwise this is an app that is golden.!!
reviews.author: Dazzril Rodrigues

reviews.title: Wonderful!
reviews.comment: This app has so many choices and it still plays after the screen idles. I have downloaded so many other similar apps and they stop playing after the screen idles. They have also included at timer so it will not run all night! Also has white noise so now I only need one app that has both lullabies and white noise. Definitely a great app if you have a baby that\'s hard to get and stay asleep.
reviews.author: jaime katlic

reviews.title: One of the better baby music apps
reviews.comment: I really like the white noise section as well.
reviews.author: Daniel Sanders

reviews.title: Used to be good..
reviews.comment: Used be good till update..  Virus scan went off the second it was done installing saying it contains known adware.  Figured this was the usual since it had ads before,  not only are there ads now,  but pop ups.  Also on free version ability to continue playing once screen times out is gone.  App is no good if I have to leave my screen on all the time to have the app work.
reviews.author: Spencer Stockburger

reviews.title: Trina
reviews.comment: This IS the best baby sleep music app. I was looking for a certain tone (dream music) and all the other apps were pretty much the same with the same 3 music choices. This one has many choices, including a timer. And I love the girls/pink/ boys blue. :) We use this app EVERY night for our 2 month old! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Happy Mom
reviews.comment: This app works awesome! My baby would never sleep for long periods of time and now that I have downloaded this it has worked wonders! Love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sexism
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe they divide the sounds between girls and boys and they put motors sounds in the boys part and house sound in the girls part. What a stupid, sexism they could do . A baby boy can fell calmed with the sound of boiling water or a girl can be calmed with train sound! Put together all the sounds! Forget about pink and blue!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I tried several other apps and none compare to this app. It has a timer, nature sounds, home sounds, and music. The music is real and not cheap keyboard sounding stuff.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE - LOVE THIS APP!!!
reviews.comment: This is a great app, my sweet baby girl loved it. Fell asleep quickly & silently....:) Download, download, download this app!!!!
reviews.author: jasmine shany

reviews.title: does the trick
reviews.comment: excellent app. sends my baby off to sleep on most tracks. although the tracks with annoying Americans singing get on my nerves
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful app for babies
reviews.comment: I love this app its so simple and easy to click and put your baby to sleep besides the whole gender thing boys\\girls its amazing !! Download it parents
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Happy baby
reviews.comment: Works on my baby everytime!!! Love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Like it a lot. But why put girls n boys if the songs r exactly the same?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works like a charm!!
reviews.comment: It has been pretty tough getting baby to fall asleep, until I DL this app! Have been 3 nights now and only using 1 music selection so far. Am thankful of the restful night I\'m getting!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Happy Nana
reviews.comment: My grandson was asleep in do in 5 minutes. I just wish the songs could shuffle.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This a great app for my son. He fall asleep with the music and it also sometimes makes me falls asleep too lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: My sons 10 months and it helps him fall asleep in about 15 minutes.
reviews.author: A Google User
